backend/main.mo: Motoko backend storing contact inquiries in a list and exposing functions to submit and fetch them.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping branding updates to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of autogenerated summaries describing the purpose of major frontend files.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base styles with OKLCH color variables and darkâ€‘mode theme tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining metadata, fonts, and root mount point for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with all main routes wrapped in the shared Layout component.
frontend/src/components/site/BrandLogo.t: Reusable logo component selecting logo variants from siteConfig with optional text display.
frontend/src/components/site/Footer.tsx: Footer rendering branding, navigation links, social icons, and contact info using siteConfig.
frontend/src/components/site/Layout.tsx: Layout component wrapping pages with Navbar and Footer.
frontend/src/components/site/Navbar.tsx: Responsive navigation bar with logo, route links, and contact CTA buttons for desktop and mobile.
frontend/src/components/site/Section.tsx: Reusable section wrapper and header components providing consistent spacing and typography.
frontend/src/config/site.ts: Defines site-wide configuration including branding, contact details, social links, and logo assets.
frontend/src/content/about.ts: Provides structured content for the About page such as vision, mission, values, and differentiators.
frontend/src/content/caseStudies.ts: Defines the CaseStudy interface and a list of detailed case study entries with challenges, approaches, results, and metrics.
frontend/src/content/pricing.ts: Exports pricing package definitions including tiers, features, pricing details, and CTA text.
frontend/src/content/services.ts: Defines service entries with icons, descriptions, and benefits for various digital marketing offerings.
frontend/src/content/testimonials.ts: Provides a list of testimonials with names, roles, companies, quotes, and ratings.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, invalidating queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/usePageMeta.ts: Updates document metadata such as title and meta tags based on provided page options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides a mutation hook for submitting inquiries to the backend with validation and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, color variables for light/dark themes, base typography, and custom utility classes like glow and text gradients.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a cn helper that merges and deduplicates Tailwind class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with hero content, mission/vision cards, values, and differentiators using data from aboutContent.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Implements the contact page with a form, inquiry submission logic, success/error states, and contact info sections.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Provides the homepage with hero section, service highlights, calls to action, and content from services and testimonials.
frontend/src/pages/PortfolioPage.tsx: Displays case studies with summaries, metrics, expandable details, and industry badges using caseStudies data.
frontend/src/pages/PricingPage.tsx: Shows pricing packages with features, highlighted plans, CTA buttons, and a custom quote section.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: React page rendering a services listings layout with hero, service cards, benefits, and CTA sections using dynamic service data.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, typography, animations, and container settings with custom theme tokens and plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing the site's goals, design system, features, requirements, and image processing needs.
